channel.title: mlc on Orange
channel.description: Recent content in mlc on Orange

item.title: Multi-label classification (and Multi-target prediction) in Orange
item.description: The last summer, student Wencan Luo participated in Google Summer of Code to implement Multi-label Classification in Orange. He provided a framework, implemented a few algorithms and some prototype widgets. His work has been “hidden” in our repositories for too long; finally, we have merged part of his code into Orange (widgets are not there yet …) and added a more general support for multi-target prediction. You can load multi-label tab-delimited data (e.
